name: fox-hole
description: Run through fox holes sneaking past robot crocodiles

scripts.babel: yarn pre-build && babel src --out-dir dist/build && uglifyjs-folder dist/build > dist/game.js
scripts.build-assets: cp index.html dist/ && cp -r assets dist/assets
scripts.build-lib: mkdir -p dist/lib && cp -t dist/lib node_modules/Phaser/build/phaser.min.js node_modules/storejs/dist/store.js
scripts.build: yarn babel && yarn clean-babel && yarn build-assets && yarn build-lib

author: Jaxson Van Doorn <jaxson.vandoorn@gmail.com>
